CustomField.description: Calculates the Applicant's Score based on various Parameters
CustomField.formula: IF(( Email_OTP_Verified__c || Mobile_OTP_Verified__c ), 10, 5) + IF(ISBLANK( Primary_Source__c ) , 0, 5) + IF(ISBLANK( Secondary_Source__c ) , 0, 5) + IF(ISBLANK( Tertiary_Source__c ) , 0, 10) + IF( HasOptedOutOfEmail , -1, 0) + IF( DoNotCall , -1, 0) + IF( hed__SMS_Opt_Out__c , -1, 0)+ Follow_Up_Task_Score__c + pi__score__c + IF( ISPICKVAL( Disposition__c , 'No Response') , -1, 0)
CustomField.label: Applicant Score
